verses.verse: And Adam <WH120> knew <WH3045> Eve <WH2332> his wife <WH802>; and she conceived <WH2029>, and gave birth to <WH3205> Cain <WH7014>, and said <WH559>, I have gotten <WH7069> a man <WH376> from <WH854> the Lord <WH3068>.

And she again <WH3254> gave birth to <WH3205> his brother <WH251> Abel <WH1893>. And Abel <WH1893> was a keeper <WH7462> of sheep <WH6629>, but Cain <WH7014> was a tiller <WH5647> of the ground <WH127>.
And in process <WH7093> of time <WH3117> it came to pass <WH7014>, that Cain brought <WH935> of the fruit <WH6529> of the ground <WH127> an offering <WH4503> unto the Lord <WH3068>.

And Abel <WH1893>, he <WH1931> also brought <WH935> of the firstborn <WH1062> of his flock <WH6629> and of the fat <WH2459> there <WH3068>. And the Lord had respect <WH8159> unto Abel <WH1893> and to his offering <WH4503>:
But unto Cain <WH7014> and to his offering <WH4503> he had not respect <WH8159>. And Cain <WH7014> was very <WH3966> angry <WH2734>, and his face <WH6440> fell <WH5307>.
And the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Cain <WH7014>, Why are you angry <WH2734>? And why is your face <WH6440> fallen <WH5307>?

If <WH518> you do well <WH3190>, shall you not be accepted <WH7613>? And if you do not well <WH3190>, sin <WH2403> crouches <WH7257> at the door <WH6607>. And to you shall be his desire <WH8669>, but you shall rule over him <WH4910>.

And Cain <WH7014> talked <WH559> with <WH413> Abel <WH1893> his brother <WH251>: and it came to pass <WH7704>, when they were in the field, that Cain <WH7014> rose up <WH6965> against <WH413> Abel <WH1893> his brother <WH251>, and killed him <WH2026>.
And the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Cain <WH7014>, Where <WH335> is Abel <WH1893> your brother <WH251>? And he said <WH559>, I know <WH3045> not <WH251>: Am I my brother's keeper <WH8104>?
And he said <WH559>, What <WH4100> have you done <WH6213>? The voice <WH6963> of your brother <WH251>'s blood <WH1818> cries <WH6817> unto me from the ground <WH127>.
And now are you cursed <WH779> from the earth <WH127>, which has opened <WH6475> her mouth <WH6310> to receive <WH3947> your brother <WH251>'s blood <WH1818> from your hand <WH3027>;

When <WH3588> you till <WH5647> the ground <WH127>, it shall not henceforth <WH3254> yield <WH5414> unto you her strength <WH3581>; a fugitive <WH5128> and a vagabond <WH5110> shall you be in the earth <WH776>.
And Cain <WH7014> said <WH559> unto the Lord <WH3068>, My punishment <WH5771> is greater <WH1419> than I can carry <WH5375>.

Behold <WH1644>, you have driven me out this day <WH3117> from the face <WH6440> of the earth <WH127>; and from <WH5921> your face <WH6440> shall I be hidden <WH5641>; and I shall be a fugitive <WH5128> and a vagabond <WH5110> in the earth <WH776>; and it shall come to pass <WH1961>, that every one that finds me <WH4672> shall kill me <WH2026>.

And the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> to him <WH3651>, Therefore whoever slays <WH2026> Cain <WH7014>, vengeance shall be taken <WH5358> on him sevenfold <WH7659>. And the Lord <WH3068> set <WH7760> a mark <WH226> upon Cain <WH7014>, lest <WH1115> any finding <WH4672> him should kill him <WH5221>.
And Cain <WH7014> went out <WH3318> from the presence <WH6440> of the Lord <WH3068>, and lived <WH3427> in the land <WH776> of Nod <WH5113>, on the east <WH6926> of Eden <WH5731>.

And Cain <WH7014> knew <WH3045> his wife <WH802>; and she conceived <WH2029>, and bore <WH3205> Enoch <WH2585>: and he built <WH1129> a city <WH5892>, and called <WH7121> the name <WH8034> of the city <WH5892>, after the name <WH8034> of his son <WH1121>, Enoch <WH2585>.

And unto Enoch <WH2585> was born <WH3205> Irad <WH5897>: and Irad <WH5897> fathered <WH3205> Mehujael <WH4232>: and Mehujael <WH4232> fathered <WH3205> Methusael <WH4967>: and Methusael <WH4967> fathered <WH3205> Lamech <WH3929>.
And Lamech <WH3929> took <WH3947> unto him two <WH8147> wives <WH802>: the name <WH8034> of the one <WH259> was Adah <WH5711>, and the name <WH8034> of the other <WH8145> Zillah <WH6741>.
And Adah <WH5711> gave birth to <WH3205> Jabal <WH2989>: he was the father <WH1> of such as live <WH3427> in tents <WH168>, and of such as have cattle <WH4735>.
And his brother <WH251>'s name <WH8034> was Jubal <WH3106>: he was the father <WH1> of all such as handle <WH8610> the harp <WH3658> and organ <WH5748>.

And Zillah <WH6741>, she also gave birth to <WH3205> Tubal <WH8423>–cain, a instructer <WH3913> of every artificer <WH2794> in brass <WH5178> and iron <WH1270>: and the sister <WH269> of Tubal <WH8423>–cain was Naamah <WH5279>.

And Lamech <WH3929> said <WH559> unto his wives <WH802>, Adah <WH5711> and Zillah <WH6741>, Hear <WH8085> my voice <WH6963>; you until <WH5647> of Lamech <WH3929>, listen <WH238> unto my speech <WH565>: for I have slain <WH2026> a man <WH376> for my wounding <WH6482>, and a young man <WH3206> for my hurt <WH2250>.
If <WH3588> Cain <WH7014> shall be avenged <WH5358> seven times <WH7659>, truly Lamech <WH3929> seventy <WH7657> and seven times <WH7651>.

And Adam <WH120> knew <WH3045> his wife <WH802> again <WH5750>; and she gave birth to <WH3205> a son <WH1121>, and called <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Seth <WH8352>: For God <WH430>, said she <WH7896>, has appointed me another <WH312> seed <WH2233> instead <WH8478> of Abel <WH1893>, whom <WH3588> Cain <WH7014> killed <WH2026>.

And to Seth <WH8352>, to him <WH1931> also there was born <WH3205> a son <WH1121>; and he called <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Enos <WH583>: then began men <WH2490> to call <WH7121> upon the name <WH8034> of the Lord <WH3068>.
